detaileddescription.para: Determine whether an unconfirmed transaction is signaling opt-in to RBF according to BIP 125 This involves checking sequence numbers of the transaction, as well as the sequence numbers of all in-mempool ancestors.

parameterdescription.para: The mempool, which may contain the tx

detaileddescription.para: Get all descendants of iters_conflicting. Checks that there are no more than MAX_REPLACEMENT_CANDIDATES distinct clusters affected.

parameterdescription.para: The set of iterators to mempool entries.

Populated with all the mempool entries that would be replaced, which includes iters_conflicting and all entries' descendants. Not cleared at the start; any existing mempool entries will remain in the set.

simplesect.para: an error message if the number of affected clusters would exceed MAX_REPLACEMENT_CANDIDATES, std::nullopt otherwise

memberdef.argsstring: (const CTxMemPool::setEntries &ancestors, const std::set< Txid > &direct_conflicts, const Txid &txid)
memberdef.name: EntriesAndTxidsDisjoint

detaileddescription.para:
Check the intersection between two sets of transactions (a set of mempool entries and a set of txids) to make sure they are disjoint.
ancestors
Set of mempool entries corresponding to ancestors of the replacement transactions.
direct_conflicts
Set of txids corresponding to the mempool conflicts (candidates to be replaced).
txid
Transaction ID, included in the error message if violation occurs.
error message if the sets intersect, std::nullopt if they are disjoint.

memberdef.argsstring: (CAmount original_fees, CAmount replacement_fees, size_t replacement_vsize, CFeeRate relay_fee, const Txid &txid)
memberdef.name: PaysForRBF

detaileddescription.para:
The replacement transaction must pay more fees than the original transactions. The additional fees must pay for the replacement's bandwidth at or above the incremental relay feerate.
original_fees
Total modified fees of original transaction(s).
replacement_fees
Total modified fees of replacement transaction(s).
replacement_vsize
Total virtual size of replacement transaction(s).
relay_fee
The node's minimum feerate for transaction relay.
txid
Transaction ID, included in the error message if violation occurs.
error string if fees are insufficient, otherwise std::nullopt.

The replacement transaction must improve the feerate diagram of the mempool.
changeset
The changeset containing proposed additions/removals
error type and string if mempool diagram doesn't improve, otherwise std::nullopt.
